statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 3 \\ -6 \\ 2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ 4 \\ -1 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 4 \\ 6 \\ 5 \\ -15 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -17 \\ -13 \\ 17 \\ -9 \\ 14 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 3 \\ -6 \\ 2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -4 \\ 4 \\ -1 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 4 \\ 6 \\ 5 \\ -15 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -17 \\ -13 \\ 17 \\ -9 \\ 14 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
